hero.sub_morning: The best caiçara breakfast awaits you.
hero.sub_afternoon: Secret beaches or a walk through the Center?
hero.sub_evening: Live music, drinks and unique gastronomy.
hero.subtitle_2: The best experiences and secrets that <0>only locals know</0>.
hero.location_desc: Go Paraty uses your geolocation to suggest the nearest attractions and businesses. Don't waste time planning complex routes.
hero.curator_desc: Smart Itineraries based on <0>Geolocation</0> and <1>Real Weather</1>. We choose the best moment for you.

filters.no_results_desc: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

agent.body_buy: Buy your parking ticket here quickly, no need to find a kiosk!

pwa.offline_desc: Content is cached! You can now explore Paraty even without signal.

footer.description: Made by those who love Paraty, for those who want to love it too. Rediscover the city with the eyes of a local.
